name: Local Deals
story: This company hosts a platform that combines employee benefits with employer discounts and rewards. This project was about helping users find deals and discounts near their provided location. I collaborated with the stakeholders of this product to revitalize the previous UI using best UX practices and modern programming techniques.
tools: Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, Adobe XD, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Zoom
hardskills: ReactJS, React Router, Redux, JSON Contracting, CSS, SASS
softskills: UX Design, Prototyping, Attention to Detail, Communication, Leadership, Decision Making, Teamwork, Quality Assurance

name: Admin Settings
story: I collaborated with the stakeholders of this product to gather all the relevant user and admin settings related to their website, including web-app plugins and site metrics, into a cohesive user experience using best UX practices and modern programming techniques.

hardskills: ReactJS, React Router, Redux, CSS, SASS

name: SOS Flyer
story: The Bay Area Dream Defenders was set to launch a grassroots campaign addressing the escalation of violence in the Child's Park neighborhood. They needed to voice their campaign launch and be able to have the neighborhood be an active participant in their campaign. I was given the opportunity to create a flyer for their target audience.
hardskills: Graphic Design, Typography, Layout Design, Ideation, Branding
softskills: Creativity, Communication, Leadership, Teamwork, Goal Setting, Self Motivation, Diversity and Inclusion

name: B&B Video Flyer
story: The Bay Area Dream Defenders hosts a monthly social where they serve free breakfast, provide free books, and discuss various topics that are impacting the community. Recently, their Graphic Designer role had opened up and they were looking for a volunteer for some of their main projects. I collaborated with the organization to produce a video flyer to digitally promote their event.
hardskills: Graphic Design, Typography, Layout Design, Ideation, Branding
softskills: Creativity, Communication, Leadership, Teamwork, Goal Setting, Self Motivation, Diversity and Inclusion

name: Call To Action Flyer
story: The Dali Museum proposed an expansion project, which would grant them $42M of taxpayer dollars that could instead be used to uplift public resources for the city. The Dali argued that this would boost the local economy and thus increase their economic contribution for those public resources but, when prompted, failed to provide proof of their existing economic contribution. And so, TPC needed to promote awareness and call upon the people of St. Pete to show up and oppose this project. I was given the opportunity to design a campaign launch flyer for TPC. As a result of the campaign launch, The Dali rescinded their proposal.
hardskills: Graphic Design, Typography, Layout Design, Ideation, Branding
softskills: Creativity, Communication, Leadership, Teamwork, Goal Setting, Self Motivation, Diversity and Inclusion

name: Library Website
role: Web Designer, Web Developer, Content Manager
story: PARSP  is all about restoring general education previously taught in public schools with the concept of a free-roaming local library. I was tasked with revitalizing their existing UI with a fresh rebrand and a user experience that would allow locals to digitally reserve books, learn more about PARSP, and access relevant community resources.
tools: CMS, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Canva
hardskills: Web Design, Graphic Design, Typography, Ideation, Branding
softskills: Prototyping, Creativity, Communication, Leadership, Decision Making, Teamwork, Goal Setting, Self Motivation

name: Education Brochure
story: This company hosts a platform that provides aspiring individuals online education. I collaborated with another designer on this print design that would inform potential students of New England College all about their options and resources pertaining to their desired education.
tools: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign
hardskills: Graphic Design, Layout Design, Ideation, Branding

name: Event Banners
story: This project was a result of a graduating class of seniors competing in a showcase of their design and typography skills. My design was chosen as the finalist, to be printed and used for future events at The Art Institutes.
hardskills: Graphic Design, Typography, Layout Design, Ideation, Branding
softskills: Creativity, Communication, Leadership, Decision Making, Goal Setting, Self Motivation

name: Restaurant Rebrand

name: Event Posters
story: Design Culture Now is a lecture series hosted by the Cooper-Hewitt National Design Museum. This three-piece promotional set of posters is a personal take on the representation of the event. I researched typographic posters and created a structural crossword puzzle design.
hardskills: Graphic Design, Typography, Layout Design, Ideation, Branding
softskills: Creativity, Communication, Leadership, Decision Making, Goal Setting, Self Motivation
